parameters: I'm sorry for the struggles you must have gone
It may not seem like it but you will heal.
Unlike many I’ve faced, you might be strong
You deserve all the pain you feel.
You don’t have the strength to heal.
You will never escape the pain.
You will never be stronger than me!
Where do goths get their super strength?
They get it from lots of heavy music!
Nalikam gives Gale an annoyed look.
Why are you acting that way?
Why would you show me kindness?
Nalikam looks confused and even hesitant to attack.
You need to do better than that!
Agrel moves in a mocking manner to make fun of your grief.
It looks straight at you but doesn’t move.
Almost like it’s waiting for you to act.
Agrel laughs at your pain and loss.
Agrel tells you that you are not strong enough to leave.
Agrel blames you for everything that has happened.
